name: Abasement
description:
ABASEMENT CONTROLS

WASD to move

SPACE to jump

SHIFT to sprint

LMB to attack

If you are wondering why it's named like that: Making this game has been a mess and it's so not finished so I decided to have a laugh with the game and call it Abasement as it's what has ended up being. I'm really bad with names as you can see :-) .

What do you do in this game? It's supposed to represent the mith of Jack O'Lantern, at first you are a human exploiting the devil for power but then the devil turns your character into a pumpkin ghost kind of like the mith. The story was more of an excuse as I've used this project to learn about unity and try to finish a game at last.

What are the enemies? I don't really know myself, I just thought of the main character but with scars or something, paint it with a nice palette and called it a day.
